lines.text: You say you feel safe with me - how do you know I'm not the weirdo?
Where have you been?

[gasps]
You scared me to death!

[laughs]
Sorry.
Only taking care of all these lonely love-starved devils.
What do you want to drink?
Oh, a milk on the rocks.
All Shannon needs to do is find herself a football team.
Wait till my attorney hears about this mess.
Yeah, just wait till my agent sees what they did to my boob!
I think I'm falling in like with you.
I think you said that without a stutter.

[laughs]
I did.
Hm-hmm.
And you know what like leads to?
What?
Love.
I've touched your wonderful body, now I wanted to see it. All of it!
How dare you even suggest such a thing? I am a nice jewish girl! My brother is a rabbi.
Yeah, well, it's not your brothers body I want to look at, it's yours!
